page.title: 16Ayot House,Ayot St.Lawrence
page.content: {AYOT HOUSE} was built in the 18thC.by Sir Lyonel Lyde.Eight yrs. ago it was made into six apartments.Some rooms are very peculiar because they were once passages or staircases.A secret passage joins the house with the pub.We cannot imagine what it was used for!Outside there is an Edwardian swimming pool,which was heated and still has its original changing room with the boiler underneath.The pool leaks and is being fixed but it would cost Â£10,000 a year to heat.There is a wooden summer house that is falling down.The people want to pull it down but it's a listed building!We enjoyed our visit and would like to live there because of the interesting garden.The house has lots of good hiding places and the secret passage!The ghost of a one time gardener haunts the house and is supposed to be seen often!
